description: This file declares functions and macros related to firmware upgrade handling in the SSP TDK layer, including configuration, download, reboot, URL management, and factory reset functions.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value specified by name and stores it as an unsigned long.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_Set_Download_Interface
methods.description: Sets the network interface for firmware download.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_Reboot_Now
methods.description: Reboots the device immediately after upgrade.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_Get_Download_Url
methods.description: Retrieves the download URL and filename.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_Set_Download_Url
methods.description: Sets the URL and filename for the firmware download.

methods.name: ssp_FWUPGRADEHAL_UpdateAndFactoryReset
methods.description: Performs firmware update and resets device to factory settings.
